HiddenText.Name: Where can I find out about Library Resources for instructors?
HiddenText.OpenningText: Where can I find out about Library Resources for instructors?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Library staff have created a guide that shows online instructors some of the resources that are available, offers tutorials on how to use many of them, and gives instructions for using Interlibrary Loan and more. The website can be found at: http://libguides.byui.edu/onlinefaculty/.
